original: Napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na pariyāpannam ca na apariyāpannam ca dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
